main event: Three unidentified lights were observed about 800 miles southwest of Hawaii from an aircraft (B-52).
interesting points: The lights included one that appeared like a navigation light and another that appeared like an exhaust.
The lights were initially stationary, then moved out of sight.
The sighting was reported from a B-52 aircraft.
The location was about 800 miles southwest of Hawaii.
photographs: no photographs included in the report
